title: Cream cheese French toast
ingredients: ['90g grated mozzarella cheese', '115g cream cheese, softened', '1 tablespoon ricotta cheese', '3 tablespoons apricot jam', '8 (5cm thick) slices French bread', '2 eggs, lightly beaten', '120ml milk', '30g cornflakes cereal, broken into crumbs', '30g unsalted butter', '475ml apricot juice', '50g unsalted butter', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '350g sliced fresh peaches', '4 tablespoons icing sugar for dusting']
